Dictionary French-English

soucis pl m —

worries pl
concerns pl
troubles pl
anxieties pl
difficulties pl
marigolds pl
woes pl
headaches pl
hassles pl

souci m —

worry n
concern n
care n
regard n
preoccupation n
anxiety n
marigold n
headache n
See more examples • See alternative translations

pas m —

step n
tread n
pace n
footstep n

pas pl m —

moves pl
steps pl
footsteps pl
strides pl
paces pl

pas adv —

not adv

de prep —

of prep
from prep
by prep (painting by, book by)
for prep
out of prep
to prep
See alternative translations
